sentence: I love hiking through mountains and deserts.
sentence_tra: 我爱徒步穿越山峰和沙漠。

sentence: The strait between the island and mainland is only 200 meters wide.
sentence_tra: 大陆和小岛之间的海峡有200米宽。

sentence: We saw various types of fish during our dive.
sentence_tra: 在潜水时我们看到了各种各样的鱼。

sentence: What kind of cuisine does this restaurant serve?
sentence_tra: 这家饭店提供哪种菜肴？

mean_cn: v. 训练，指导n. 四轮大马车，教练；长途汽车
sentence: My fitness coach teaches me how to exercise.
sentence_tra: 我的塑形教练教我如何锻炼。

mean_cn: n. 遗产; 继承物; 传统; 文化遗产;
sentence: The building is the symbol of our culture heritage.
sentence_tra: 这个古建筑是我们文化传统的象征。

sentence: A dozen eggs now costs twenty dollars--how expensive!
sentence_tra: 一打鸡蛋现在要20美元！好贵啊！

sentence: Profits have increased year on year.
sentence_tra: 利润连年增长。

sentence: She was very good at her job, so her boss promoted her to a higher position.
sentence_tra: 她工作表现很棒，所以她的老板把她升到了更高的位置。

sentence: My apartment cost me a lot - I hope you find it sufficiently luxurious.
sentence_tra: 我的公寓花了我一大笔钱- 我希望你觉得它足够奢华。

sentence: The fox uses a parachute to descend.
sentence_tra: 这只狐狸用降落伞来下降。

sentence: I was supposed to do my work on the third, but I put off working until the fourth.
sentence_tra: 我应该在三号做我的工作，但是我推迟到了四号。

mean_cn: n.拱廊；有拱廊的街道；街机游戏机；游乐场所
sentence: The young boys spent the whole day playing games at the arcade.
sentence_tra: 这个年轻的男孩在街机上玩儿了一整天了。

mean_cn: n. 年鉴;  一年生植物;  一年一度的事件;  adj. 一年一次的;  年度的;  全年的;
sentence: 2012's annual budget has been prepared by the government.
sentence_tra: 2012年的年度预算已经被政府筹备好了。

sentence: We took an excursion into the forest.
sentence_tra: 我们去森林远足了。

mean_cn: adj.外国的，海外的　　adv.在海外
sentence: We export the goods overseas.
sentence_tra: 我们把货物出口到海外。

mean_cn: n. (由汽船、汽车等牵引在空中滑翔的)帆伞运动 动词parasail的现在分词形式.
sentence: I love parasailing over the water with my parachute.
sentence_tra: 我爱带着帆伞划过水面的感觉。

sentence: I don't think I studied enough for the exam. I'm feeling very nervous about it.
sentence_tra: 我觉得这个考试我准备得还不够，我还是感觉很紧张。

sentence: She couldn't put up with his loud snoring every night.
sentence_tra: 她无法忍受他每晚巨响的鼾声。

mean_cn: n.学期；术语v.把…称为；把…叫做
sentence: They are learning science this school term.
sentence_tra: 他们这学期学习科学课程。

sentence: As a farmer, I own acres and acres of land.
sentence_tra: 作为一个农民，我拥有很多亩土地。

mean_cn: adj.基本的，首要的，主要的n.首选，（美）初选
sentence: Young children play at their primary school.
sentence_tra: 小朋友在小学（最初上的学校就是小学）玩耍。

sentence: Conservation of our environment is very important.
sentence_tra: 保护环境很重要。

mean_cn: n.吸引，吸引力，具有吸引力的事物(或人)
sentence: As soon as we met, there was an instant attraction between us.
sentence_tra: 我们一见面，我们之间瞬间就有一种吸引力。

sentence: The constant crying of our neighbor's baby is starting to get annoying.
sentence_tra: 邻居家宝宝持续不断的哭声开始变得特别烦人了。

sentence: He lost consciousness after drinking too much.
sentence_tra: 他喝得太多，失去了知觉。

sentence: You can walk quicker and easier if your movements have correct form.
sentence_tra: 如果你的动作正确，你就能走得更快更轻松。

mean_cn: n. 漩涡;  混乱, 纷乱;
sentence: We barely managed to get out of the whirlpool.
sentence_tra: 我们差点就没从漩涡里出来。

sentence: Ecological balance should be maintained by all.
sentence_tra: 所有人都应该维持生态平衡。

sentence: Windsurfing is so much fun!
sentence_tra: 风帆冲浪运动真有趣！

sentence: Preservation of greenery is a must for the welfare of mankind.
sentence_tra: 为了全人类的福利，保护绿色植物是必须的。

sentence: I made a huge bet in the game but I lost, and now I have no money...
sentence_tra: 我在赌局中打了很大一个赌，但我输了，现在我没钱了。

sentence: The whole family got together for my birthday.
sentence_tra: 全家人为庆祝我的生日聚在一起。

sentence: Rural areas are so much prettier than cities.
sentence_tra: 乡下地方比城市美多了。

mean_cn: vt: 吸收, 吸引…的注意, 理解, 承受;
sentence: Sponges can absorb a lot of water.
sentence_tra: 海绵可以吸收很多水分。

sentence: Taste in clothes changes with every era.
sentence_tra: 每个时代对于衣服的品味都在改变。

mean_cn: n.储备，后备，保护区v.储备，保留，预定
sentence: The store keeps a large reserve in case prices suddenly go higher.
sentence_tra: 仓库保持大量库存以防物价突涨。

sentence: I'll have to stay home from work today--I have the flu.
sentence_tra: 我不得不请假在家，我得了流感。

mean_cn: phr. 克服; 恢复; 熬过; 原谅;
sentence: It's been a year, and he still won't get over his breakup.
sentence_tra: 已经一年了，他仍然没有从他的分手中恢复过来。

sentence: We should protect the native ecology.
sentence_tra: 我们应该保护原生生态。

mean_cn: vi. 声明;  表态;  vt. 表明;  宣布;  强调;  显示;
sentence: I now declare this meeting open.
sentence_tra: 我现在宣布会议开始。

sentence: If someone's skating on a canal by a windmill, typically they're in Holland.
sentence_tra: 假如有人在运河上滑雪，还路过风车，通常情况下他们多半是在荷兰。

sentence: This mountaineering expedition uses ropes for safety.
sentence_tra: 为了安全，这次登山探险使用了绳索。

sentence: He has an office job, but his passion is photography.
sentence_tra: 他有一份办公室的工作，但他的兴趣是摄影。

sentence: We eat dozens of eggs in a month.
sentence_tra: 一个月里我们吃了许多鸡蛋。

mean_cn: adj. 被附上的；与世隔绝的v. 附上（enclose的过去式和过去分词）围绕, 装入, 放入封套
sentence: The little puppy is completely enclosed! I bet he feels safe.
sentence_tra: 这只小狗狗完全被包起来了！我想它一定感到很安心。

sentence: I decided to take up the guitar as a hobby, even though I'm a little old for it.
sentence_tra: 我决定把吉他当爱好,虽然我现在学有点老。

mean_cn: v.驯服，驯化 adj.驯服的，顺从的
sentence: Don't worry, these cows are tame--they won't hurt you.
sentence_tra: 别担心，这些奶牛很温顺，他们不会伤害你。

sentence: Their family is very rich, they have their own servant to serve them food and drinks.
sentence_tra: 他们家非常有钱，他们有自己的仆人来上菜和上饮料。

sentence: My nerdy boyfriend likes to point out mistakes in the books I'm reading.
sentence_tra: 我那书呆子男朋友喜欢指出我正在读的书中的错误。

mean_cn: n. 优先; 优先权; 优先考虑的事; 重要事项 ;
sentence: My priority is to finish my homework then dinner.
sentence_tra: 我得先做完作业才能吃晚餐。

sentence: As responsible citizens, it's our duty to vote.
sentence_tra: 作为有责任感的市民，投票是我们的责任。

sentence: I am confined to my jail cell.
sentence_tra: 我被囚禁在监牢里了。

mean_cn: vi. 让步;  vt. 承认;  容许, 让步;
sentence: He finally conceded defeat in the tennis competition.
sentence_tra: 他终于在网球比赛中认输了。

sentence: We have a responsibility to take care of our parents.
sentence_tra: 我们有责任照顾父母。

sentence: Daniel proposed marriage by getting down on one knee.
sentence_tra: 丹尼尔单膝跪地求婚。

sentence: He had to refute the prostitute.
sentence_tra: 他得反驳那个妓女。

mean_cn: n. 手册, 指南;  adj. 手的;  手制的, 手工的;
sentence: Wow, you can drive a manual transmission car?
sentence_tra: 哇，你能驾驶手动挡汽车？

mean_cn: adj. 工作的；操作的；可行的n. 工作；活动；制作；操纵v. 工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）
sentence: Now that I'm a working man, I have to wear a suit every day.
sentence_tra: 现在我是个上班族了，不得不每天穿正装。

sentence: Like many businesses, we take very good care of our high-status customers.
sentence_tra: 和其他商家一样，我们很重视高端客户。

mean_cn: n.谈到，提及v.提及，提名，推荐
sentence: I forgot to mention that tomorrow the office is closed.
sentence_tra: 我忘记说了，明天办公室不开。

mean_cn: n.头；上端；领导人v.率领；前进；出发adj. 头的；主要的；在顶端的
sentence: My head aches - maybe I think too much...
sentence_tra: 头好痛，也许是我用脑太多了。

sentence: A lot of research and logical thinking went into the lawyer's well-argued legal paper.
sentence_tra: 那个律师的法律文件论证充分，含有许多调研和逻辑思考。

sentence: We had an argument about which movie to watch.
sentence_tra: 就为了到底看哪部电影我俩争论了半天。

sentence: Isn't that a risky method of transportation?
sentence_tra: 这难道不是一种危险的交通方式吗？

mean_cn: n. 统计学; 统计; 统计数字;
sentence: I use facts and statistics to prove my point.
sentence_tra: 我用事实和统计数字来证明我的观点。

sentence: He wanted to commit suicide because of all of the problems in his life.
sentence_tra: 由于生活中诸多不顺，他想自杀。

sentence: Our homework burden is too heavy!
sentence_tra: 我们的课业负担太重了。

mean_cn: n. 方面，阶段，(月等的)变相，盈亏
sentence: The moon will pass through all of its phases in about one month.
sentence_tra: 月亮在大约一个月的时间里会呈现所有月相的变化。

sentence: The sport of weightlifting requires strength.
sentence_tra: 举重运动需要力量。

mean_cn: n. 冲动, 欲望;  vi. 驱策;  力荐;  vt. 力劝, 敦促;  驱策;
sentence: During the race the rider urged the horse to go faster so he could win.
sentence_tra: 在比赛中，骑手为了赢得胜利，不断鞭策他的马加快速度。

sentence: Martin was back in motion after his recovery.
sentence_tra: 马丁一痊愈就恢复了运动。

sentence: It's sensible to avoid drinking or smoking too much.
sentence_tra: 避免喝太多酒和抽太多烟是很明智的。

sentence: When I was a teenager, my face was covered with pimples.
sentence_tra: 当我还是青年的时候，我的脸长满了丘疹。

sentence: He was reluctant to eat his vegetables, but his mother made him do it.
sentence_tra: 他不愿意吃他碗里的蔬菜，但他妈妈让他（必须）吃。

sentence: During puberty girls grow hair on their body.
sentence_tra: 青春期女孩们会长体毛。

mean_cn: phr. 计算出; 锻炼; 计划; 解决;
sentence: It didn't take long for the teacher to work out the math problem on the board.
sentence_tra: 老师不用花很长时间就能在黑板上解出这道数学题。

mean_cn: n. 跷跷板（游戏） v . 摇摆不定；交替变化
sentence: Bill and Mary played see-saw because they liked each other and were about the same weight.
sentence_tra: 因为他们都很喜欢对方而且重量差不多，所以比尔和玛丽很喜欢一起玩跷跷板。

mean_cn: n. 提议; 计划;  求婚;  vt. 向…提出;
sentence: The investors were very impressed by our business proposition.
sentence_tra: 投资者们对我们的商业计划非常满意。

sentence: Over the years laws have been created to prevent discrimination.
sentence_tra: 多年来法律一直被制定用来反对歧视。

sentence: Jesus Christ! The male sex hormone dominates that woman!
sentence_tra: 我天！那女人的雄性荷尔蒙太旺盛了吧！

sentence: We need to cope with the Pope.
sentence_tra: 我们需要对付教皇。

mean_cn: n.上司，长辈adj.优良的，卓越的，较高级的
sentence: Our superiors tell us what to do.
sentence_tra: 我们的上司告诉我们要做什么。

mean_cn: v.紧紧抓住；黏着，挨近；依恋，依附；坚持，墨守，忠实于
sentence: The sloth clings to the tree.
sentence_tra: 树懒（一天到晚）黏着树。

mean_cn: n.(常用复数)资源，财力，办法
sentence: The world's oil supply is a limited resource.
sentence_tra: 世界石油资源是有限的。

sentence: My first day at my first job is the beginning of adulthood!
sentence_tra: 我第一份工作的第一天也是我作为成年人生活的开始。

mean_cn: vi. 变深;  变低沉;  vt. 挖深, 使变深;  使变浓;  使低沉;
sentence: If the hole's too shallow for the tree roots, you'll need to deepen it.
sentence_tra: 如果挖的洞对树根来说太浅，你必须得挖深点。

mean_cn: n.青少年 ，少女 adj.青春期的，青少年的
sentence: I hate arguing with my adolescent daughter.
sentence_tra: 我讨厌和处在青春期的女儿争论。

sentence: The proceeds of the charity will go towards helping children.
sentence_tra: 慈善活动带来的收入会用来帮助孩子们。

sentence: The ad said the product was absolutely guaranteed to work.
sentence_tra: 广告说这个产品是绝对保证有效的。

sentence: I recognize you! We were in middle school together!
sentence_tra: 我认出你来了，我们曾经一起上高中！

sentence: My mother was astonished by my new haircut.
sentence_tra: 我妈妈被我的新发型惊倒了。

mean_cn: v.收集；领取；聚集； 募捐
sentence: I collect old stamps for fun.
sentence_tra: 我因为好玩而收集旧邮票。

sentence: His huge size is due to his beer drinking habits.
sentence_tra: 他肥胖是因为他有喝啤酒的习惯。

sentence: I am a freshman in college.
sentence_tra: 我是大学一年级学生。

sentence: Precious gems like diamonds are very valuable.
sentence_tra: 像钻石一样珍贵的宝石是很贵重的。

mean_cn: adj.明亮的，卓越的，有才气的；聪颖的
sentence: The little girl is brilliant; she is already doing college level math.
sentence_tra: 这个小女孩很聪明，她已经会做大学难度的数学题了。

mean_cn: n. 进行, 前进, 发展;  adj. 进行中的, 不间断的;

sentence_tra: 圆圈循环代表不间断的过程。

sentence: I bought this flag as a souvenir on my trip.
sentence_tra: 我在旅途中买了这面旗子作为纪念品。

mean_cn: adj.批评的，文艺评论的，极度重要的，危险的
sentence: The patient is in critical condition--move quickly!
sentence_tra: 病人处境非常危险，动作要快！

sentence: Hooray, we get to go to the funfair and ride on the roundabouts and the big wheel!
sentence_tra: 好耶，我们可以去游乐场坐回旋车和大转轮了！

mean_cn: v.驾驶，驱动n.驾车；驱动力；干劲
sentence: It is a long drive from Los Angeles to New York City.
sentence_tra: 从洛杉矶到纽约要开很久的车。

sentence: I gave a 10 euro donation to the homeless man.
sentence_tra: 我为那个无家可归的人捐了10欧元。

mean_cn: n.品脱 （液量，干量名〈美〉液量=0.47升强，干量=0.55升）
sentence: Could you buy me a pint of beer?
sentence_tra: 你能给我买一品脱啤酒吗？

sentence: We need to finance our business with lots of outside money.
sentence_tra: 我们需要大量外部资金来支持生意。

mean_cn: v. 养殖；养育；筹集（资金）；举起n. 加薪；提高
sentence: First raise the flag, then lower it to start the race!
sentence_tra: 先举起旗帜，然后放低它表示开始比赛。

mean_cn: vi. 计算;  估计;  vt. 计算*;  估计;  计划;
sentence: Let's calculate the final amount.
sentence_tra: 我们来计算一下最终的量吧。

sentence: The screen is so vivid that the pictures were virtually right there in front of me.
sentence_tra: 屏幕里的东西那么栩栩如生，仿佛那些照片（事实上）就在我的眼前。

sentence: I will be a sophomore this year.
sentence_tra: 今年我就大二了。

mean_cn: n. 结实的斜纹布;  耐久力;  adj. 持久的, 永久的;
sentence: Their love was a lasting one - they had been married for forty years.
sentence_tra: 他们的爱非常持久―他们已经结婚四十年了。

sentence: It was sitting in a tree.
sentence_tra: 它正站在一棵树上。

mean_cn: n. 分隔栏；售货摊；厩v.停止（因故障）
sentence: We picked up some fruit from the fruit stall.
sentence_tra: 我们从水果摊上选了些水果。

mean_cn: adj. 宽厚的;  慷慨的;  充裕的;  肥沃的;
sentence: The generous man gives lucky money to us on November 11th.
sentence_tra: 这个慷慨的男人在11月11日给我们发红包。

sentence: I have about 300 dollars on hand, but I can go to the bank for some more.
sentence_tra: 我手上有300美元，但是我可以去银行取更多。

sentence: This bus is a bit too crowded.  I think I'll wait for the next one.
sentence_tra: 这辆公交车有点太挤了，我想我会等下一辆。

mean_cn: n.资金，基金，存款v.拨款，提供基金
sentence: These coins are my holiday fund.
sentence_tra: 这些硬币是我的假日基金。

sentence: His parents knew how he felt - they were also alumni of his university.
sentence_tra: 他的父母知道他的感受――他们也是他的大学校友。

mean_cn: n. 卡拉0K录音；自动伴奏录音
sentence: I and my friends love to sing karaoke together.
sentence_tra: 我和朋友们都爱集体唱卡拉OK。

mean_cn: v. 购买；努力取得n. 购买
sentence: I would like to purchase this shirt, please.
sentence_tra: 我要买这件衣服，谢谢。

mean_cn: adj. 令人震惊的, 骇人听闻的; 令人憎恶的, 不正当的;
sentence: My mobile phone bill this month was shocking!
sentence_tra: 我这个月的电话账单太令人震惊了！

mean_cn: vi. 捐献, 捐赠;  vt. 捐献, 捐赠;
sentence: I donate blood to help those who need it.
sentence_tra: 我献血给需要的人们。

mean_cn: adj. 迅速的, 动作敏捷的;  很快做完的;  头脑灵活的;  不褪色的;  牢固的;  扎牢的;  耐…的;  adv. 迅速地;  牢固地;  彻底地;
sentence: The car was driving so fast; I could hardly see it!
sentence_tra: 那辆车开的太快了！我几乎看不见它了。

mean_cn: phr. 谈到; 提及; 总计; 开始(认识, 理解);
sentence: Come to mention it, I am a little hungry. Can I have some too?
sentence_tra: 说到这个，我还真有点儿饿了，我也能吃点儿吗？

sentence: The young scholar studied literature extensively.
sentence_tra: 这个年轻的学者广泛地涉猎了各种文学。

mean_cn: n.家adj.家的，主场的adv.在家，回家地； 到正确的位置；到终点
sentence: The family was happy at home.
sentence_tra: 这家人待在家里很开心。

sentence: I'm waiting here to pick up the kids after school.
sentence_tra: 我正等在这儿来接放学回家的孩子们。

sentence: The boy is starving; he hasn't had food in days.
sentence_tra: 这男孩儿饿惨了，他好几天没吃东西了。

sentence: She appeals to us to promote gender equality at the conference.
sentence_tra: 她在大会上呼吁我们促进性别平等。

sentence: We forecast that the business will do better in the coming year.
sentence_tra: 我们预测在接下来一年生意会更好。

sentence: In times of famine, we do not have enough food to eat.
sentence_tra: 在闹饥荒的时期，我们没有足够的食物。

mean_cn: adj.年长的；资格老的，地位较高的n.(大学或高中)毕业生
sentence: Senior citizens should be respected.
sentence_tra: 年长的人应该被尊重。

sentence: You should substitute fruits and vegetables for sweets.
sentence_tra: 你应该多吃蔬菜水果，代替甜食。

mean_cn: n. 精神；心灵；志气；烈酒
sentence: We burn these for our ancestors in the spirit world.
sentence_tra: 我们烧纸来给冥界的祖先。

sentence: I have to buy a turkey to cook for thanksgiving.
sentence_tra: 因为是感恩节，所以我要买一只火鸡做来吃。

sentence: The dog pulled the stuffing out of the chair.
sentence_tra: 狗扯出了沙发里的填充物。

sentence: I spent last year travelling through Turkey.
sentence_tra: 我用去年的时间漫游了整个土耳其。

sentence: The settlers traveled very far.
sentence_tra: 这些移民者经历了长途跋涉。

mean_cn: adj.轻快的，生气勃勃的；兴隆的，繁忙活跃的；寒冷而清新的
sentence: They were young and fit, and kept up a brisk pace on their training runs.
sentence_tra: 他们年轻，身材匀称，在跑步机上保持着轻快的频率。

sentence: I like driving on this part of the highway.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢在这段高速路上开车。

mean_cn: n. 人们;  adj. 民间的, 民俗的;
sentence: They are wearing traditional folk clothing.
sentence_tra: 他们穿着传统的民间服饰。

sentence: Rich people ride in limousines behind dark windows so they can't be seen.
sentence_tra: 富人们乘坐着带黑玻璃的豪华轿车免得被看见。

sentence: Can you please fix my printer?
sentence_tra: 请帮我修理打印机行吗？

sentence: A wedding is not a wedding without a bouquet of flowers.
sentence_tra: 如果没有花束，婚礼就不能被称为婚礼了。

mean_cn: n. 肉汁；不法利润；轻易得来的钱
sentence: A perfect gravy is cooked by adding spices to it.

mean_cn: n. 马夫;  新郎;  v. 修整;  装扮;  照料;
sentence: The bride and groom are both good looking\uff01
sentence_tra: 新娘新郎的颜值爆表啊！

mean_cn: n. 司机v. 开车运送；当汽车司机
sentence: My chauffeur drives me anywhere I tell him to with a nod and smile.
sentence_tra: 我的司机会点头微笑着，带我去到我告诉他的地方。

mean_cn: n. 专家; 专科医生;  adj. 专家的; 专业的;
sentence: Be relaxed! We are specialists for plastic surgery!
sentence_tra: 放心吧！我们可是整容专家！

sentence: The four bridesmaids wore pink to their best friend's wedding.
sentence_tra: 那四位女傧相穿了粉红色衣服去参加她们最好朋友的婚礼。

mean_cn: n.文具；（有配套信封的）信纸
sentence: I have prepared all the stationery for my exams.
sentence_tra: 我准备好了考试需要用到的所有文具。

sentence: Let's dine together tonight.
sentence_tra: 今晚一起吃饭吧。

mean_cn: n.交通费，乘客，食物v.（事）进行得（好或坏）
sentence: The fare for this bus ride is $2.
sentence_tra: 这一程巴士收费2美元。

mean_cn: n.装备，全部用品，(协同工作)的一组人v.提供装备
sentence: Your little boy looks so cute in that outfit!
sentence_tra: 你宝贝穿上这套衣服看起来非常可爱。

sentence: The bride wore a beautiful white wedding gown.
sentence_tra: 新娘穿着漂亮的白婚纱。

sentence: When he tried to kiss her, she resisted.
sentence_tra: 当他想亲她时，她拒绝了。

mean_cn: adj.邪恶的，罪恶的n.邪恶，罪恶
sentence: Don't listen to her--she's beautiful, but she's evil!
sentence_tra: 别听她的，她很漂亮，但她也很邪恶。

sentence: The woman at reception said my room is ready now.
sentence_tra: 在前台的女士说我的房间已经准备好了。

sentence: He specializes in fixing computers.
sentence_tra: 他专门从事修电脑这一行。

mean_cn: n. 再联合;  再结合;  (亲友等的)重聚; 团聚;
sentence: The twin sisters were excited at their reunion after being apart for so long.
sentence_tra: 久别重逢让两姐妹很激动。

sentence: The cake was cut and beer was served on the occasion.
sentence_tra: 这时候（大家）切开了蛋糕并喝起了啤酒。

mean_cn: adj. 昂贵的;  代价高的;  价值高的;
sentence: This house is not as costly as I thought.
sentence_tra: 这房子没有我预期的那么贵。

sentence: Even on holiday I can't stop reading this exciting book!
sentence_tra: 即使在假期我也忍不住读这本激动人心的书！

mean_cn: v.满得外溢，外流，泛滥；充满，洋溢n.溢流口，溢流管；容纳不下的物(或人)；溢出，满出
sentence: My glass is overflowing; pour less water next time!
sentence_tra: 我杯子的水都满得溢出来了，下次少倒点。

mean_cn: vi. 再联合; 再结合; 重聚;  vt. 使再联合; 使重聚; 使再结合;
sentence: The soldier was reunited with his girlfriend after the war.
sentence_tra: 战后，士兵和她的女朋友重逢了。

sentence: The party was very fun, but afterwards we had to clean up.
sentence_tra: 聚会很有趣，但是结束以后我们得打扫。

mean_cn: v.租借，雇用 n.租借，雇佣
sentence: You seem like a great person to work with. You're hired!
sentence_tra: 你看起来是个一起工作不错的人，你被雇佣了。

mean_cn: n.串，群，伙，束v.集中，挤在一起；使成一束(或一群等)

sentence_tra: 情人节我给了她一束花。

mean_cn: n.花商；种花者；花卉研究者

sentence_tra: 我请花商选了些花以便送给我老婆。

mean_cn: n. 视野；见解； 风景v. 看，俯瞰；视察
sentence: What an amazing view from up here!
sentence_tra: 山顶的风景太赞了！

sentence: I love this perfume's fragrant smell.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢这瓶香水的香味。

mean_cn: adv. 在室内, 在屋里;
sentence: We're pretty boring. We like to stay indoors.
sentence_tra: 我们是很无聊的人，我们喜欢待在家里。

sentence_tra: 这条长林荫道通往一栋巨大的乡间别墅。

sentence: The photographer is taking pictures with a camera.
sentence_tra: 摄影师在用照相机拍照。

sentence: Soy sauce is made from soybeans.
sentence_tra: 酱油是用大豆做的。

sentence: He gave in to temptation and fell into the honey-trap.
sentence_tra: 他经受不住诱惑，中了美人计。

sentence: My photo album has many old photos.

sentence_tra: 这个小老鼠咬食物的样子真可爱。

sentence: She consults her doctor to find out what she should do about the pain.
sentence_tra: 她咨询她的医生去找出治疗她疼痛的方法。

sentence: Mom was thankful for the gifts.
